page.title: 11The Cricket Club
page.content: Barby Cricket Club is probably the most active club in Barby. There is a mens, a ladies and a youth team. The men play in the Advertiser League and the youth in the Avon league. Only two people from outside Barby are allowed to play in each team. This is a bit mean on Kilsby people as they haven't got a pitch of their own. The Cricket Club hold many social functions and are a focus for many social activities. In Kilsby the Tennis Club and School Association often carry out this social role. There is also a senior Hockey Club and recently a hockey club has been formed. the Hockey Pitch is being made at the moment. All the different clubs that use the field make a regular contribution to pay for new grass and for the new toilet block.
